author: wn.com
title: From bedside to patient: An Ebola survivor's odyssey (Stanford School of Medicine)
text: ( Source : Stanford School of Medicine ) Moreover, earlier in October, a Scottish nurse who was declared cured of Ebola 10 months ago suffered a relapse and remains in 'serious but stable' condition at the Royal Free Hospital in London ,
